mapper.sql: id, order_no, customer_id, store_goods_warehouse_code, store_goods_warehouse_name, destination_warehouse_code, destination_warehouse_name, is_pick, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, order_origin, bol_no, need_declare, need_clearance, remark
mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_no,t.customer_id,t.offer_info_id,t.reserve_size,t.store_goods_warehouse_code,t.store_goods_warehouse_name,t.destination_warehouse_code,t.destination_warehouse_name,t.is_pick,t.create_time,t.create_user_id,t.create_user_name,t.order_origin,t.bol_no,t.need_declare,t.need_clearance,t.remark,t.charge_weight,t.volume_weight,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.total_cartons,t.amazon_reference_id,t.extension_number,t.sales_commission,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name, t1.company, t2.types,t2.names,t2.sail_time,t2.cut_off_time, t3.tid,t3.start_shipment,t3.destination_port,t3.gidtype, t4.code_name tname, t5.code_name startShipmentName, t6.code_name destinationPortName, CONCAT(t5.code_name,'->',t6.code_name) shipRoute from order_info t left join customer t1 on t1.id = t.customer_id left join offer_info t2 on t2.id = t.offer_info_id left join quotation_template t3 on t3.id = t2.qie left join transport_way t4 on t4.id = t3.tid left join harbour_info t5 on t5.id_code = t3.start_shipment left join harbour_info t6 on t6.id_code = t3.destination_port where t.id = #{id}

select t.id,t.order_no,t.customer_id,t.offer_info_id,t.reserve_size,t.store_goods_warehouse_code,t.store_goods_warehouse_name,t.destination_warehouse_code,t.destination_warehouse_name,t.is_pick,t.create_time,t.create_user_id,t.create_user_name,t.order_origin,t.bol_no,t.need_declare,t.need_clearance,t.remark,t.charge_weight,t.volume_weight,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.total_cartons,t.amazon_reference_id,t.extension_number,t.sales_commission,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name, t1.qie,t1.names,t1.types,t1.sail_time,t1.cut_off_time,t1.jc_time,t1.jkc_time,t1.estimated_time,DATEDIFF(t1.estimated_time,t1.sail_time) voyage_day,t1.remarks, t2.start_shipment,t2.destination_port,t2.bubble_coefficient,t2.gidtype, t3.code_name startShipmentName, t4.code_name destinationPortName, t5.name reserveSizeName, t6.code_name tname from order_info t left join offer_info t1 on t1.id = t.offer_info_id left join quotation_template t2 on t2.id = t1.qie left join harbour_info t3 on t3.id_code = t2.start_shipment left join harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t2.destination_port left join quotation_type t5 on t5.code = t.reserve_size left join transport_way t6 on t6.id = t2.tid where 1=1 and t.id = #{orderInfoId}

select t.id,t.order_no,t.customer_id,ifnull(t.offer_info_id, #{offerInfoId, jdbcType=INTEGER}) offer_info_id ,t.reserve_size,t.store_goods_warehouse_code,t.store_goods_warehouse_name,t.destination_warehouse_code,t.destination_warehouse_name,t.is_pick,t.create_time,t.create_user_id,t.create_user_name,t.order_origin,t.bol_no,t.need_declare,t.need_clearance,t.remark,t.charge_weight,t.volume_weight,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.total_cartons,t.amazon_reference_id,t.extension_number,t.sales_commission,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name, t1.qie,t1.names,t1.types,t1.sail_time,t1.cut_off_time,t1.jc_time,t1.jkc_time,t1.estimated_time,DATEDIFF(t1.estimated_time,t1.sail_time) voyage_day,t1.remarks, t2.start_shipment,t2.destination_port,t2.bubble_coefficient,t2.gidtype, t3.code_name startShipmentName, t4.code_name destinationPortName, t5.name reserveSizeName, t6.code_name tname from order_info t left join offer_info t1 on t1.id = #{offerInfoId, jdbcType=INTEGER} left join quotation_template t2 on t2.id = t1.qie left join harbour_info t3 on t3.id_code = t2.start_shipment left join harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t2.destination_port left join quotation_type t5 on t5.code = t.reserve_size left join transport_way t6 on t6.id = t2.tid where 1=1 and t.id = #{orderInfoId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CONCAT('配载单号:',orderConfNo,CHAR(10),'提单号:',oceanBillNo,CHAR(10),'柜号:',cntr_no,';',CHAR(10)) confinfo from ( select distinct t2.cntr_no, t3.order_id oceanBillNo, t5.order_no orderConfNo from order_case t left join counter_case t1 on t1.order_case_id = t.id left join ocean_counter t2 on t2.id = t1.ocean_counter_id left join ocean_bill t3 on t3.id = t2.ob_id left join (select * from ocean_conf_detail where types = 2) t4 on t4.id_code = t3.id left join order_conf t5 on t5.id = t4.order_id where t.order_id=#{orderId} ) t
select id, cntr_no, cabinet_code, volume, cost, cid, status, ob_id, create_time from ocean_counter where ob_id = #{tdId}

select t.id,t.order_info_id,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.sort,t.days,t.day_flag,t.operators,t.minutes,t.score,t.remarks,t.status,t.reason,t.up_time,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from waybill_task_relevance t where t.order_info_id = #{orderId} order by t.sort asc

select t.up_time,t.operators, CONCAT('点击【',t.task_name, '】任务,',statusDescribes) operateDescribes from ( select up_time,operators,task_name, (case status when '0' then '未激活' when '1' then '已激活' when '2' then '异常' when '3' then '已完成' else null end) as statusDescribes from waybill_task_relevance where 1=1 and up_time is not null and order_info_id=#{id} ) t order by t.up_time desc

select t.id, t.order_no, t.customer_id, t.offer_info_id, t.reserve_size, t.store_goods_warehouse_code, t.store_goods_warehouse_name, t.destination_warehouse_code, t.destination_warehouse_name, t.is_pick, t.create_time, t.create_user_id, t.create_user_name, t.order_origin, t.bol_no, t.need_declare, t.need_clearance, t.remark, t.charge_weight, t.volume_weight, t.actual_weight, t.actual_volume, t.total_cartons,t.amazon_reference_id,t.extension_number,t.sales_commission,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name from order_info t where 1=1
and t.customer_id = #{form.customerId}

select t.id,t.order_no,t.customer_id,t.offer_info_id,t.reserve_size,t.store_goods_warehouse_code,t.store_goods_warehouse_name,t.destination_warehouse_code,t.destination_warehouse_name,t.is_pick,t.create_time,t.create_user_id,t.create_user_name,t.order_origin,t.bol_no,t.need_declare,t.need_clearance,t.remark,t.charge_weight,t.volume_weight,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.total_cartons,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name, t1.qie,t1.names,t1.types,t1.sail_time,t1.cut_off_time,t1.jc_time,t1.jkc_time,t1.estimated_time,DATEDIFF(t1.estimated_time,t1.sail_time) voyage_day,t1.remarks, t2.start_shipment,t2.destination_port,t2.bubble_coefficient, t3.code_name startShipmentName, t4.code_name destinationPortName, t5.name reserveSizeName from order_info t left join offer_info t1 on t1.id = t.offer_info_id left join quotation_template t2 on t2.id = t1.qie left join harbour_info t3 on t3.id_code = t2.start_shipment left join harbour_info t4 on t4.id_code = t2.destination_port left join quotation_type t5 on t5.code = t.reserve_size where 1=1 and t.order_no = #{orderNo}

select t.id,t.order_no,t.customer_id,t.store_goods_warehouse_code,t.store_goods_warehouse_name,t.destination_warehouse_code,t.destination_warehouse_name, t.is_pick,t.create_time,t.create_user_id,t.create_user_name,t.order_origin,t.bol_no,t.need_declare,t.need_clearance,t.remark, t.charge_weight,t.volume_weight,t.actual_weight,t.actual_volume,t.total_cartons,t.amazon_reference_id,t.extension_number,t.sales_commission,t.front_status_code,t.front_status_name,t.after_status_code,t.after_status_name, t1.company, t2.names,t2.sail_time,t2.cut_off_time, t3.taskItems taskTodo, t4.group_name, t5.destination_port, t6.state_code destinationCountryCode from order_info t join customer t1 on t1.id = t.customer_id join offer_info t2 on t2.id = t.offer_info_id JOIN ocean_conf_detail ocd on ocd.id_code = t2.id and ocd.types=1 JOIN order_conf oc on oc.id = ocd.order_id left join ( SELECT t.order_info_id, GROUP_CONCAT(t.task_name order by sort asc) AS taskItems FROM waybill_task_relevance t where t.status != 3 GROUP BY t.order_info_id ) t3 on t3.order_info_id = t.id left join operation_team t4 on t4.id = t1.operation_team_id left join quotation_template t5 on t5.id = t2.id left join harbour_info t6 on t6.id_code = t5.destination_port WHERE 1 = 1 and oc.id = #{confId}
